text: Storm Elvin Thorgerson (28 February 1944 - 18 April 2013) was an English graphic designer who worked with music bands such as Led Zeppelin and Pink Floyd. Thorgerson was born on 28 February 1944 in Potters Bar, Middlesex, England. He died from cancer in England on 18 April 2013 at age 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Radio interview transcript *BBC Feature and audio interview *BBC Article on Thorgerson's work: Audio slideshow: Storm's sleeves *TateShots: Storm Thorgerson on Magritte The artist talks about the influence of Magritte on his work. 21 July 2011 Category:1944 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:English artists Category:People from Middlesex
title: Storm Thorgerson
